E98 COMPACT A
 
 
 
 
The Faema E98 Compact A has been designed to occupy minimal counter space and, due to its flexibility, permits the operator to use it as a portable espresso coffee machine or to be connected directly to the water main.
 
Specifications
  • compact automatic espresso coffee machine with programmable volumetric portion control by micro-processor
  • Cappuccino Magic automatic dispensing of frothed milk and espresso simultaneously at the touch of one button
  • 1 additional steam spout and 1 hot water spout
  • coffee brewing control by means of touch buttons
  • can operate as a pour-over (portable built-in water tank with water softner)
  • electronic water level control
  • built-in vibrating pump
  • gauge for boiler pressure control
  • available in 1 group version only
  • die cast aluminium and stainless steel outer case
  • colour: 2 tone grey
   
TECHNICAL DATA
E98 Compact 1 group
Boiler capacity (liters) 2.5
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 1900W
Dimensions ( mm)
*with feet		 WxDxH
370x510x475
